thread.title: Heroic pastor adopts 16 kids with HIV | New York Post
thread.title_full: Heroic pastor adopts 16 kids with HIV | New York Post

title: Heroic pastor adopts 16 kids with HIV | New York Post
text: 1:03 Heroic pastor adopts 16 kids with HIV A pastor in India has made it his mission in life to help children with HIV who have lost or been abandoned by their families. So far, he has 22 kids, 16 of whom have been diagnosed with HIV. 0:36 Little gymnast with a prosthetic leg flips expectations Delaney Dunlap, a young girl from Loveland, Ohio, is becoming a local gymnastics star. The 8-year-old was born with a bone missing in her leg — a condition known as fibular hemiphilia. Her parents said the decision to amputate was made easier after seeing their daughter’s natural athletic ability and overall positive attitude. 0:57 These migrants just showed how easy it is to jump a border wall Hundreds of migrants from Morocco have been entering the Spanish enclave of Ceuta simply by climbing over the border wall that separates the two territories. They hope to find passage to Europe through the autonomous Spanish city. 1:01 This color-changing dye is like a mood ring for your hair Designer Lauren Bowker has developed color-changing hair dye, which reacts to temperature fluctuations in your environment. The product, known as FIRE, debuted at London Fashion Week in collaboration with Storm Models. 0:31 Man shoves handfuls of live bees down his shirt In order to prove his patience and self-control, an unidentified Indian man allowed himself to be filmed shoving live bees down his shirt. He literally grabs handfuls of bees from a hive and forces hundreds, if not thousands, of the insects down his shirt. 0:56 Dirtbags beat up Bronx deliveryman while bystanders watch Ahmed Sayed, a 21-year-old Chinese food deliveryman, was attacked and robbed in the lobby of a building in the Bronx. Perhaps the most shocking part of the video, however, is all of the bystanders who are standing around nearby and doing nothing to help. 1:17 Racist jerk is forced to pay for his tirade While riding on a train from London to Glasgow, 47-year-old Alexander Mackinnon allegedly yelled at another passenger's child and then hurled racist insults at the mother. She filmed him as he continued to insult her while talking on the phone, before he was removed from the train by police and fined. 1:18 This woman suffers from a disease that makes her smell like fish Kelly Fidoe-White got complaints about her odor her entire life, to the point where she would take multiple showers a day. In 2015, she was diagnosed with trimethylaminuria, a condition that prevents her body from breaking down certain compounds in foods, which are then expelled from the body through sweat, breath and urine, which causes a fish- or onion-like odor. 0:58 The Syrian government wanted her dead but this young girl survived Rescue workers saved a young girl trapped under the debris after an airstrike in Syria. The attack destroyed three rebel-held neighborhoods outside Damascus, killing at least seven people. The heroes who found the girl are part of Syria Civil Defense, a volunteer organization also known as the White Helmets. 1:03 This hoverbike is almost as cool as a jetpack The Scorpion-3, a prototype of a so-called "hoverbike," went on a test run in a warehouse in San Francisco. The electric vehicle was developed by the Russian tech company Hoversurf using quadcopter drone technology.
